meanings.definition: A type of rose that produces clusters of flowers.
meanings.sent1: The floribunda in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I love the vibrant colors of floribunda roses.
meanings.sent3: The floribunda decided to throw a party for all the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a floribunda, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The floribunda's fragrance filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: Having many flowers or flower clusters.
meanings.sent1: The floribunda bush in the yard is always full of blooms.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful floribunda dress to the garden party.
meanings.sent3: The floribunda cake was decorated with edible flowers.
meanings.sent4: The field was a floribunda of colors in the spring.
meanings.sent5: The floribunda garden was a sight to behold in full bloom.
